page.title: 03PRINCIPAL FEATURES 1
page.content: The{Central Business District}of Readi ng covers 100 hectares and is focused on Broad St., the main shopping area. Marks and Spencer,Heelas,Debenham Littlewoods,and BHS are amongst major stores,100 customers/min can be using one shop.Friar St.to the north is almost as busy with some of the stores having dual access.{The Civic {Centre}complex to the south,was built in the last 15yr's.This 6 hectare site includes:Butts centre,a 2 storey shopping centre of 94 units;multi storey car park;Hexagon Theatre;Civic offices ;police station and Magistrates court.{The Ramada hotel adjoins the site in 1983,it has 200 bedrooms and is Reading's first international 4* hotel.Many large office blocks are near the main shops The Inner Distribution Rd is being ext ended into the Queens and Kings Road.
